extendedInfo.description: The VEX Sack Attack App is the ideal competition companion for teams, spectators, and event planners involved in the 2012-2013 VEX Robotics Competition season. The app provides quick access to the official game manual with search capability, including in-app alerts when new versions of the manual are released. Additionally, a helpful scoring calculator for Sack Attack is provided for use during practice matches or while evaluating game strategies.

reviews.title: Crashes when you enter settings
reviews.comment: I cannot update the manual as I cannot get into settings. It should also be able to connect to the scoring app on a computer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t see double digits
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app, the only big problem is when I go to increase sack numbers, I can only see the first digit and the very top of the second digit below it when I hit 10
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good overall
reviews.comment: An overall good app, but as my android is cheap and small the score calculator doesn\'t scale enough :/ I can\'t view the total scores properly... potentially an easy fix though
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Nice and easy app to use but it would be great if the scoring app could work with tournament manager to make scoring for this season much easier and quicker
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tablet friendly update please.
reviews.comment: Works great on on my phone but not on my tablet,  any chance for a version that runs under jellybean?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tablet UI
reviews.comment: Although the app uses the recent android UI paradigms, it only offers mediocre support for tablets. Many actions are condensed into sub menus for phones. Additonally the images on the Score calculator do not scale up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This name is really gay
reviews.comment: Seriously whoever came up with this could not be serious or strait in any way.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Review
reviews.comment: Great app, nice to have the rules and a match scorer all in one app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Easy to read/search all of the info on the new game. Scoring app looks fun to use, can\'t wait to try it out at a competition
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sweet app
reviews.comment: This app will be so useful during events. The search feature works great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great resource
reviews.comment: This will be extremely useful throughout the season
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Anonymous
reviews.comment: All Yu niggas gonna lose to my bot
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Helps a lot in competitions. Too help me team keep track of our score through out
reviews.author: Ben Jones

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Saves lots of time counting and calculating sacks.
reviews.author: A Google User
